sentences.sContent: the look of joy on her face
The garden was his pride and joy.
sentences.sCn: 这座花园是他的骄傲和乐趣所在。

sentences.sContent: ...What distinguishes children from adults is their strong ability to derive joy from what they aredoing...
...treat pleasure and joy as the enemies of competence and responsibility...
...Becoming educated should not require giving up joy but rather lead tofinding joy in new kinds of things: reading novels instead of playing with small figures...
...or think of joy as an unaffordable luxury in anation where there is awful poverty...
...It is human nature to seek joy in life...
...It will not be difficult to make learning a source of joy if educators change their way of thinking...
...the more important it is for that child to find joy in his or her classroom...
...The joy of a recession means no argument next year...

words.tran: 令人高兴的；充满欢乐的（等于joyful）
